__e: It's not that we're horrible people, Carolyn.
Look, don't paint me as some sort of a freak for wanting to remain independent. There are plenty of normal people out there who don't want to have kids.
Now, normal people don't even know what that is, but... it's all dark now.
We've placed them with families, they're going to school -- resuming their lives as best they can.
People just want me to do the things that they're too shit-scared to ask for in their normal life.
I can't just go back to my normal life.
I just want things to be normal again.
Soon there were only a few of us normal ones left out there, and finally, in here.
Then he made you regular size again. And now he's made your baby brother big. Right.
Tell me again why we couldn't fly like normal people?
It ain't right, him being here with normal people.
You know, if you want someone to take him off your hands for the evening so you can go out, you know, like normal people do...
- Yeah? - I... The thing is, under normal circumstances, my accounts...
He wants to get out of here, and I don't blame him.
You know, under normal circumstances, I don't need anybody's help, right?
I mean, there's this one, the normal one, and then the other one that goes away.
My kids aren't normal and now I don't have time for this so...
